text:
I’ll try to post some stuff although my time on projects seems to be very erratic at the moment with homework and coursework so it seems to be slowing at the moment. Can’t wait till this is something I’m studying so that that’s the homework. All seems to be slowing a bit which is frustrating but I just seem to be lacking the time. 

Sorry going to bombarded with questions because I was listening to a 30 min podcast about interns but was wondering what university you went to and whether you did/recommend and internship .

Also wondering whether you made time to do vfx or just tried to slot it in when you could.
